biotools.summary: Speed up editing of sequence alignments. It allows the simultaneous editing of many nucleotide or amino acid sequences using mouse functions and shortcuts, as well as automatic overlapping of sequence fragments, searching and sorting of sequences, and multiple alignment using ClustalX.

bioschemas.name: QuickAlign
